item.title: My thoughts on Cambridge Analytica
item.description: I am writing this to share my conclusions regarding the Cambridge Analytica affair. I have a somewhat unique perspective on the topic for three reasons: My day job consists of measuring the effectiveness of digital advertising. I have first hand experience with the technology and methods that Cambridge Analytica claims to have used. I played a small role in unearthing the Cambridge Analytica scandal.
